title: Scarlett Curtis: 'There's a long line of very dodgy men in my family'
text:
When she was 12 years old, Scarlett Curtis’ history teacher walked into the classroom and said, ‘“That’s it, there’s been a financial crisis, none of you are ever going to get jobs.’”

Her generation has since earned their nickname of Doomers. Having grown up in a crucible of environmental disaster, social media, terrorism, on-line porn, financial meltdowns, student debt, rolling news and lately, the word with a B and an x in it, perhaps it’s fair enough if they have grown up with raised levels of anxiety and depression.

“We still don’t know how much external factors impact on it. Mental health is pretty complicated and actually, I just think life is pretty hard.”

Hmmn, ish. How hard can life...
description: When she was 12 years old, Scarlett Curtis’ history teacher walked into the classroom and said, ‘“That’s it, there’s been a financial crisis, none of you are ever going to get jobs.
